references: Related: CF 257673. Superseding: Ord 94617, Ord 93142, Ord 95300.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department, fixing compensation of certain Boundary hydroelectric project positions retroactive to May 1, 1967; providing funds therefor by appropriation from the Lighting Fund and superseding Ordinance 94617, Ordinance 93142 and the 1967 Salary Ordinance (95300) insofar as in conflict.
